ValidationRule.description: Users are not allowed to change a Lead Source once it has been set on a Lead
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $User.Alias <> "autocln", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, $User.Profile_Name_Text__c <> "PGi Marketing User", ISCHANGED(LeadSource), NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(PRIORVALUE(LeadSource) = ""), NOT($Setup.BypassRules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to change the Lead Source once its set on a Lead.
